    • Field Detail

      • roomChange

        public boolean roomChange
        This variable is detected by the mapScreen and initialises the room change

      • talkToOnEnd

        Suspect talkToOnEnd
        This variable stores the NPC that the person will talk to when they finish walking. It is null if nothing should happen

      • findOnEnd

        Clue findOnEnd
        This variable stores a clue that has been clicked on. It is to be collected when the player arrives at the clue

      • trackToNext

        private Vector2Int trackToNext
        This variable stores a goal location to be tracked to the next time the player completes a move

      • transitionOnEnd

        private boolean transitionOnEnd
        This boolean stores whether the player is to transition to the next room or not when they finish walking

        This Moves the player to a new tile.
        Specified by:

      • interact

        public void interact(Vector2Int tileLocation)
        This method is called when the player clicks on the screen. This is handled in the PlayerController and passed to here
        Parameters:
        tileLocation - - The tile location they clicked at.

      • getClosestNeighbour

        public Vector2Int getClosestNeighbour(Vector2Int goal)
        This method checks what the best fit neighbour tile is for a goal. It bases its decision on the players location and what tiles are not locked
        Parameters:
        goal - - The goal destination
        Returns:
        - The best fitting tile

      • lessThanPriorityDecision

        private Vector2Int[] lessThanPriorityDecision(int check,
                                              Vector2Int[] priority,
                                              int priorityListFirst,
                                              int priorityListSecond,
                                              Vector2Int first,
                                              Vector2Int second)
        This method checks the coordinate and places the directions as a priority in a list. This is used by the `getClosestNeighbour` method
        Parameters:
        check - - The number to check is less than 0
        priority - - The priority list
        priorityListFirst - - The first position to place a direction in
        priorityListSecond - - The second position to place a direction in
        first - - The first priority direction
        second - - The second priority direction
        Returns:
        Vector2Int the priority list back after being modified

      • isOnTriggerTile

        public boolean isOnTriggerTile()
        This method returns whether or not the player is standing on a tile that initiates a Transition to another room
        Returns:
        (boolean) Whether the player is on a trigger tile or not

      • finishMove

        public void finishMove()
        Description copied from class: AbstractPerson
        Finalises the move by resetting the animation timer and setting the state back to standing. Called when the player is no longer moving.
        Overrides:
        finishMove in class AbstractPerson

      • moveRoom

        public void moveRoom()
        This takes the player at its current position, and automatically gets the transition data for the next room and applies it to the player and game

        Clue - The found clue
